column1: Request to Pay is a direct bank transfer, exclusive payment method by MultiSafepay and Deutsche Bank for instant banking. Based on the PSD2 Open banking API, it makes your bank transfers automated, faster and easier.

column3: exclusieve betaalmethode van MultiSafepay en Deutsche Bank. Gebaseerd op PSD2 Open Banking API

column1: Are you active in the Belgian market? Then, KBC/CBC is a useful addition to your webshop payment suite. With this payment method, you will be able to better target the Belgian market!

column1: Direct debit is the easiest way for trusted businesses to charge customers on a recurring basis.
column2: "Direct Debit is de meest makkelijke manier voor vertrouwde webshops om online consumenten terugkerend in rekening te brengen."

column1: With E-Invoicing by MultiSafepay, you have complete control over the entire payment process and all communications with your customers.

column1: Are you active in Belgium with your webshop? Then ING Home'Pay is a valuable addition to your check-out.
